name: Lockdown 2020 (Ethangle)
description: It's the year 2020. The world is in lockdown. COVID-19 is spreading rapidly yet some people are still breaking the rules. Your task is to deal with these people and help slow the spread. You'll have to search your neighbourhood for resources to build weapons and buy essential items to help you in your mission. But be careful not to get infected yourself, or fail to return home for a lockdown, otherwise it's Game Over.
